SELECT
SUM(p.Amount) as TodaySumAmount, sum(p.Qty * p.StockPrice) as SaleCost, sum(p.Amount-p.Qty * p.StockPrice) as sumProfit
FROM PurchaseItemBak p left join PurchaseBak b on p.BuyDate = b.BuyDate and p.StoreID = b.StoreID and p.MachID = b.MachID and p.ReceiptID = b.ReceiptID WHERE 1=1
and b.StoreID = #{purchaseBak.StoreId}
and ( b.BuyDate = #{purchaseBak.BuyDate} and b.BuyTime >= #{purchaseBak.BuyTime} or b.BuyDate > #{purchaseBak.BuyDate})
SELECT StoreID, SUM (TotalAmount) AS AMT, COUNT (DISTINCT(CardID)) AS HYS FROM Purchasebak WHERE BuyDate = #{purchaseBak.BuyDate} AND CardID !='' and CardID is not null GROUP BY StoreID
